text:
@narendramodi @MagufuliJP Dear @MagufuliJP sir Thank you so much for taking care of fellow indians. 
@narendramodi sir please ask them how do they control covid-19 crisis. They did not take the help from WHO. They are out of the crisis. We should apply Tanzanian model instead of WHO.
